event.title: Ruby Advent Calendar jp-en: 2010
event.description:
This is the English track of “Ruby Advent Calendar 2010”.

Please write tips of Ruby of the day.

Screen shots by @tenderlove: http://tenderlovemaking.com/2010/12/09/ruby-advent-calendar/

1. Click the giant red button
2. Choose “Twitterでログイン”
3. Input your name and click “保存する”(Save)
4. Open http://atnd.org/events/10439 and click the red button again
5. Write some comment and click the red “このイベントに参加登録する” (Register at this event)
6. Post a tips on your blog and add comment to this page (the 1st author is 1 Dec, 2nd author is 2 Dec, ..)

Anyone is welcome!

jp track: Ruby Advent Calendar jp: 2010
